name: Tam Bui
summary: Skilled accountant with experience in the manufacturing industry. Proficient in AR, AP, reconciliations, GL accounts, and month-end closing; familiar with accounting software such as DBA and Imaginary, Mainframe (AS400). Strong MS Word, Excel, and Outlook skills; able to multi-task in a high-paced, deadline-driven environment.

experience.title: Staff Accountant
experience.description: Maintain general ledger; prepare journal entries; code invoices; accounts analysis and reconciliation; close books monthly; balance sheet and income statement reconciliations; AR and AP processes; file 1096 and 1099 forms; bank reconciliations; cash flow forecasting; prepare monthly financial reports; payroll timecards; maintain customers/vendors.

experience.title: Sr. Accountant
experience.description: Validate and process Warranty/Royalty claim accounts; update inventory standard cost; reconcile travel expense reports; prepare month-end cutoff tests; interact with internal and external clients, vendors, partners; apply best practices in credit and collections; reconcile AR/inter-company sales; prepare journal entries for month end.

experience.title: Sr. Accountant
experience.description: Maintain general ledger; AR/AP; reconcile accounts; file 1096/1099; bank reconciliations; cash flow forecasting; prepare monthly financial statements; payroll timecards; maintain customers/vendors.

experience.title: Controller Assistant
experience.description: Worked with the controller to prepare monthly and yearly financial statements; assisted in Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Prepaid accounts; bank reconciliation; cash collection.

education.degree: Bachelor of Business Administration in Accounting
